question.text: Which one of the following is a CORRECT statement?

options.text: "Bt" in "Bt-cotton" indicates that it is a genetically modified organism produced through biotechnology.
Somatic hybridization involves the fusion of two complete plant cells carrying desired genes.
RNAi takes place in all eukaryotic organisms as a method of cellular defense.
Golden rice is vitamin C enriched rice.

solution.text:
The "Bt " in BT cotton stands for Bacillus thuringiensis, which is a soil bacterium.

Somatic hybridization is the process in which the protoplasts of two different plant species fuse to form hybrids.

Enhanced nutritional value of food, e.g., golden rice, i.e., Vitamin ‘A’ enriched rice.
